Nature Publishing Group UK.

Genetic structure of Rhinoceros Rock Iguanas, Cyclura cornuta, in the Dominican Republic, with insights into the impact of captive facilities and the taxonomic status of Cyclura on Mona Island. Conservation Genetics, 21: 837–851. Springer Netherlands.
